# This file was generated by Jucer2Reprojucer from "Projucer.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED Projucer_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "Projucer_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(Projucer_jucer_FILE
  "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "4.3.1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${Projucer_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "M70qfTRRk"
)

  PROJECT_NAME "Projucer"
  PROJECT_VERSION "4.3.1"
  PROJECT_TYPE "GUI Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.juce.theprojucer"

  juce_core
  PATH "../../modules"
  # JUCE_FORCE_DEBUG
  JUCE_LOG_ASSERTIONS ON
  # JUCE_CHECK_MEMORY_LEAKS
  # JUCE_DONT_AUTOLINK_TO_WIN32_LIBRARIES

  JUCE_USE_CURL ON
  # JUCE_CATCH_UNHANDLED_EXCEPTIONS
  # JUCE_ALLOW_STATIC_NULL_VARIABLES
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS "-Wall -Wshadow -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wshadow -Wshorten-64-to-32 -Wstrict-aliasing -Wuninitialized -Wunused-parameter -Wconversion -Wsign-compare -Wint-conversion -Woverloaded-virtual -Wreorder -Wconstant-conversion -Wsign-conversion"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_SMALL "<None>"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  DOCUMENT_FILE_EXTENSIONS ".jucer"
  CUSTOM_PLIST "<plist>
<dict>
	<key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key>
	<dict>
		<key>NSAllowsArbitraryLoads</key>
		<true/>
		<key>NSExceptionDomains</key>
		<dict>
			<key>amazonaws.com</key>
			<dict>
				<key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
				<true/>
				<key>NSIncludesSubdomains</key>
				<true/>
			</dict>
		</dict>
	</dict>
</dict>
</plist>"
  EXTRA_FRAMEWORKS "AudioUnit\; Accelerate\; AVFoundation\; CoreAudio\; CoreAudioKit\; CoreMIDI\; DiscRecording\; QuartzCore\; AudioToolbox\; OpenGL\; QTKit\; QuickTime"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "-O0 (no optimisation)"
  OSX_BASE_SDK_VERSION "Use Default"
  OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET "10.9"
  OSX_ARCHITECTURE "Use Default"
  # CUSTOM_XCODE_FLAGS
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "Use Default"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
  # CODE_SIGNING_IDENTITY
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE
  # LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION
  # STRIP_LOCAL_SYMBOLS
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "-O3 (fastest with safe optimisations)"
  OSX_BASE_SDK_VERSION "Use Default"
  OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET "10.7"
  OSX_ARCHITECTURE "Use Default"
  # CUSTOM_XCODE_FLAGS
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "Use Default"
  CXX_LIBRARY "LLVM libc++"
  # CODE_SIGNING_IDENTITY
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE
  # LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION
  # STRIP_LOCAL_SYMBOLS
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  # EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  # PLATFORM_TOOLSET "v120"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  # TREAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  WHOLE_PROGRAM_OPTIMISATION "Always disable"
  # INCREMENTAL_LINKING
  # PREBUILD_COMMAND
  # POSTBUILD_COMMAND
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  CHARACTER_SET "Default"
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2013"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  # TREAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  WHOLE_PROGRAM_OPTIMISATION "Enable when possible"
  # INCREMENTAL_LINKING
  # PREBUILD_COMMAND
  # POSTBUILD_COMMAND
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  CHARACTER_SET "Default"
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE
)

  "Visual Studio 2015"
  # EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
  # PLATFORM_TOOLSET "v140"
)

  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  # TREAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use DLL runtime"
  WHOLE_PROGRAM_OPTIMISATION "Enable when possible"
  # INCREMENTAL_LINKING
  # PREBUILD_COMMAND
  # POSTBUILD_COMMAND
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  CHARACTER_SET "Default"
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE

  "Visual Studio 2015"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  WARNING_LEVEL "High"
  # TREAT_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS
  RUNTIME_LIBRARY "Use static runtime"
  WHOLE_PROGRAM_OPTIMISATION "Enable when possible"
  # INCREMENTAL_LINKING
  # PREBUILD_COMMAND
  # POSTBUILD_COMMAND
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  CHARACTER_SET "Default"
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  # RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS "-std=c++11"
  # EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
  ICON_SMALL "<None>"
  ICON_LARGE "Source/BinaryData/juce_icon.png"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "-O0 (no optimisation)"
  ARCHITECTURE "(Default)"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Projucer"
  # BINARY_LOCATION
  # HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
  # EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
  # PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
  OPTIMISATION "-O3 (fastest with safe optimisations)"
  ARCHITECTURE "(Default)"
)

jucer_project_end()
